languages.text: "Себя прошлого. Паскаль Ханейманн — эволюционное продолжение Амарната. Более совершенное, менее подверженное ошибкам. Модернизация не может быть предметом сожалений". {n}Упавший хрип вокса, вопреки словам техножреца, удивительно похож на печальный шепот.{/n}

"My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect, less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox sounds remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Себя прошлого. Паскаль Ханейманн — эволюционное продолжение Амарната. Более совершенное, менее подверженное ошибкам. Модернизация не может быть предметом сожалений". {n}Упавший хрип вокса, вопреки словам техножреца, удивительно похож на печальный шепот.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect; less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox is remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect, less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox sounds remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect, less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox sounds remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “那只是曾经的自我。帕斯卡·哈努曼是进化版的阿玛纳特，他更加完美，更加不容易出错。自我改进从来都不会是件令人遗憾的事情。”{n}尽管这位技术神甫这样说着，但他的声音听起来像极了充满悲伤的低语。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect, less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox sounds remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “那只是曾经的自我。帕斯卡·哈努曼是进化版的阿玛纳特，他更加完美，更加不容易出错。自我改进从来都不会是件令人遗憾的事情。”{n}尽管这位技术祭司这样说着，但他的声音听起来像极了充满悲伤的低语。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Mi anterior ser. Pasqal Haneumann es una prolongación evolucionada de Amarnat. Más perfecta y menos propensa a errores. La modernización nunca es algo de lo que arrepentirse». {n}A pesar de las palabras del tecnosacerdote, el castañeteo apagado de su voco recuerda mucho a un triste susurro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect, less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox sounds remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Mi anterior ser. Pasqal Haneumann es una prolongación evolucionada de Amarnat. Más perfecta y menos propensa a errores. La modernización nunca es algo de lo que arrepentirse». {n}A pesar de las palabras del tecnosacerdote, el castañeteo apagado de su voco recuerda mucho a un triste susurro.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「かつての己だ。パスカル・ヘニュマンはアマルナトを進化させたものだ。より完璧に、よりミスが少なくなった。近代化は決して後悔するものではない」{n}技術司祭の言葉とは裏腹に、彼のヴォクスの控えめなきしめくような音は、驚くほど悲しげなささやきに聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect, less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox sounds remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「かつての己だ。パスカル・ヘニュマンはアマルナトを進化させたものだ。より完璧に、よりミスが少なくなった。近代化は決して後悔するものではない」{n}技術司祭の言葉とは裏腹に、彼のヴォクスの控えめなきしめくような音は、驚くほど悲しげなささやきに聞こえる。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Mein früheres Ich. Pasqal Haneumann ist eine weiterentwickelte Fortführung von Amarnat. Perfekter, weniger fehleranfällig. Modernisierung ist niemals zu bereuen." {n}Ganz entgegen der Aussage des Techpriesters klingt das gedämpfte Rasseln seines Vox erstaunlich nach einem traurigen Flüstern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect, less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox sounds remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Mein früheres Ich. Pasqal Haneumann ist eine weiterentwickelte Fortführung von Amarnat. Perfekter, weniger fehleranfällig. Modernisierung ist niemals zu bereuen." {n}Ganz entgegen der Aussage des Techpriesters klingt das gedämpfte Rasseln seines Vox erstaunlich nach einem traurigen Flüstern.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Qui j'étais autrefois. Pasqal Haneumann est une évolution d'Amarnat, plus parfaite et moins encline à l'erreur. La modernisation n'est jamais source de regrets. » {n}Malgré ses paroles, le cliquetis sombre de son vox s'apparente étrangement à un murmure triste.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect, less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox sounds remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Qui j'étais autrefois. Pasqal Haneumann est une évolution d'Amarnat, plus parfaite et moins encline à l'erreur. La modernisation n'est jamais source de regrets. » {n}Malgré ses paroles, le cliquetis sombre de son vox s'apparente étrangement à un murmure triste.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect, less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox sounds remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}

languages.text: "Eski benliğim. Pasqal Haneumann, Amarnat'ın evrim geçirmiş bir devamıdır. Daha kusursuz ve hataya daha az meyillidir. Modernleştirmeden pişmanlık duyulmamalıdır." {n}Tekno Rahip'in sözlerine rağmen voksundan çıkan bastırılmış tıkırtılar, hüzünlü bir fısıltıyı andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My former self. Pasqal Haneumann is an evolved continuation of Amarnat. More perfect, less prone to error. Modernisation is never regrettable." {n}Despite what the Tech-Priest just said, the subdued rattle of his vox sounds remarkably like a sad whisper.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eski benliğim. Pasqal Haneumann, Amarnat'ın evrim geçirmiş bir devamı. Daha kusursuz ve hataya daha az meyilli. Modernleştirmeden pişman olunulmamalıdır." {n}Tekno Rahip'in söylediği sözlere rağmen, voksundan çıkan bastırılmış tıkırtı sesleri, hüzünlü bir fısıltıyı fazlasıyla andırıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
